Class Ini

java.lang.Object
  Ini
Direct Known Subclasses:
Manifest
public class Ini
extends Object

As documented at: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/INI_file
Any key not in a section is in the "global" (null) section at the beginning of the ini stream.
Supported:

  • comments as either ; or #, on their own line or after an item
  • whitespace is ignored, both blank lines as well as whitespace before and after keys and values
  • values can be quoted with single quotes (') or double quotes (")
  • only the first key encountered is used, other instances of the same name are ignored
  • changing a value changes it in place
  • removing a key removes the comment at the end of the line
  • key/value pairs can be delimited with either = or :

update

public Ini update(Ini newValues)
Updates (adds or replaces) elements from another Ini. Each section is iterated over, then each key/value is iterated over and set on this. Comments on key/value are maintained. Comments on their own lines are not maintained. Comments on sections are not maintained. Empty sections are not maintained. Duplicate sections/keys are not maintained (first wins).

Parameters:
newValues - Values from another Ini to update this with
Returns:
this

equals

public boolean equals(Object obj)
Determines if this is equal to another object. Comments and duplicate sections and key/values are ignored in the comparison.

Overrides:
equals in class Object
Parameters:
obj - The object to compare against
Returns:
true if obj is an Ini which has the same sections, with the same key/value pairs.

_replaceWithList

private static String _replaceWithList(String item,
                                       String[] searches,
                                       String[] replaces)
Does a series of search and replaces on a string. Walks through a list of search patterns and replaces them with a matching replacement string.

Parameters:
item - The string to modify
searches - The strings to search for. Length must be the same as replaces
replaces - The strings to replace with. Length must be the same as searches
Returns:
item with every instance of searches replaced with replaces

_escape

private static String _escape(String raw)
Escapes a string for writing to a line. First replaces the _unescapes with the _escapes. Then walks every character that is not in the range of _minUnescaped and _maxUnescaped inclusive gets converted to a unicode value.

Parameters:
raw - The raw data. May be null
Returns:
raw encoded for ini files, or null if raw was null

_unescape

private static String _unescape(String escaped)
Unescapes a value from an ini-type stream. Reverses the search/replace and then looks for unicode value patterns and replaces them.

Parameters:
escaped - A value from an ini-type stream. May be null
Returns:
The unescaped form of escaped or null if escaped was null

_trimIfNotNull

private static String _trimIfNotNull(String value)
Trims a string if it is not null.

Parameters:
value - possibly null string
Returns:
if value is null, null is returned, otherwise value.trim() is returned

_reverse

private static String[] _reverse(String[] in)
Reverses and array of strings.

Parameters:
in - The array of strings
Returns:
An array with the same contents as in, but reversed.

_findSectionStart

private int _findSectionStart(String section)
Finds the index of the first item of the given section. If the section is empty, returns the index of the next section. If the section is empty and the last section, returns the index after the last line.

Parameters:
section - The section to look for, or null for the globa section.
Returns:
the index of the first item after the given section, or -1 if the section does not exit

_findKey

private int _findKey(int sectionStart,
                     String key)
Finds the index of a key in a section. Walks all items starting at sectionStart until (a) we reach the end of the elements, (b) we reach another section or (c) we find the key.

Parameters:
sectionStart - The offset of the first item in a section
key - The key to look for.
Returns:
the index of the key, or -1 if the key does not exist in this section.

_findKeyInSection

private Ini._Line _findKeyInSection(int sectionStart,
                                    String key)
Finds the index of a key in a section. Walks all items starting at sectionStart until (a) we reach the end of the elements, (b) we reach another section or (c) we find the key.

Parameters:
sectionStart - The offset of the first item in a section
key - The key to look for.
Returns:
The actual _Line for the given key in the section, or null if not found

_findEndOfSection

private int _findEndOfSection(int sectionStart)
Finds the next section index.

Parameters:
sectionStart - The index of the first item in the section. Must not be less than zero.
Returns:
The index of the next section, or _lines.size() if this is the last section.
